item.title: Falling Tree Coverage: Dhaka faces environmental crisis
item.description: In Dhaka, a single tree must support the oxygen needs of around 28 people - far below what is needed for a healthy, livable environment. Across the country, forests are shrinking, with 0.25 million acres of forest land illegally grabbed and overall coverage falling by 0.1 million acres since 2015.
